title: PlayStation’s Summer Sale arrives on July 16
description: PlayStation’s Summer Sale is almost here! Kick off the season with a wide range of offers on digital PS5 and PS4 games and add-ons at PlayStation Store starting July 16 at 00:00am PDT/BST/JST.  The promotion includes the likes of EA Sports FC 25 Standard Edition for 79% off (PS5, PS4), Call of Duty: Black Ops […]
author: Stuart Brann
byline: Nick Maguire VP, Global Services, Global Sales and Business Operations, SIE
excerpt: Exciting offers on PlayStation games and more from July 16 through August 13.
text: PlayStation’s Summer Sale is almost here! Kick off the season with a wide range of offers on digital PS5 and PS4 games and add-ons at PlayStation Store starting July 16 at 00:00am PDT/BST/JST.  The promotion includes the likes of EA Sports FC 25 Standard Edition for 79% off (PS5, PS4), Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 – Cross-Gen Bundle for 45% off (PS5, PS4), Assassin’s Creed Shadows Digital Deluxe Edition for 25% off (PS5), Forza Horizon 5 Standard Edition for 25% off (PS5) and Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 for 10% off (PS5) for a limited time.* But there’s many more titles included! You can preview just some of those games below, while the full list of PlayStation Store offers will be revealed when the sale begins – visit the PlayStation Store page here once the sale is live to browse available games and discover the next gaming adventure to embark on. [REDACTED] 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim 325,000 Source Crystals 60 Seconds! Learn more here.***  In Benelux, Portugal, and Spain, all PlayStation Plus members ordering directly from PlayStation can also enjoy an extra 5% discount on all purchase from direct.playstation.com. (Discount automatically applied when signed in to an eligible PSN account at the time of transaction). *Sale refreshes at 00:00am PDT/BST/JST on July 29 and some deals will be replaced by new offers. Sale ends on August 13 at 23:59 PDT/BST/JST. Certain deals end before August 13. Check PlayStation Store for details of individual deals. **Offers end 7/29/25. Offers available on select products, while supplies last. Vertical stand sold separately. ***Sony Interactive Entertainment Direct Europe Limited, trading as PlayStation®, is an introducer Appointed Representative of Raylo Group Limited, which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN 841488). Raylo is a trading name of Raylo Group Limited, a company registered in England and Wales (Company No. 11554120). Registered office address is 5 New Street Square, London, EC4A 3TW. PlayStation acts as a credit broker, not a lender, and only introduces customers to Raylo Group Limited. Trending Stories
html:
PlayStation’s Summer Sale is almost here! Kick off the season with a wide range of offers on digital PS5 and PS4 games and add-ons at PlayStation Store starting July 16 at 00:00am PDT/BST/JST. 

The promotion includes the likes of EA Sports FC 25 Standard Edition for 79% off (PS5, PS4), Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 – Cross-Gen Bundle for 45% off (PS5, PS4), Assassin’s Creed Shadows Digital Deluxe Edition for 25% off (PS5), Forza Horizon 5 Standard Edition for 25% off (PS5) and Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 for 10% off (PS5) for a limited time.*

But there’s many more titles included! You can preview just some of those games below, while the full list of PlayStation Store offers will be revealed when the sale begins – visit the PlayStation Store page here once the sale is live to browse available games and discover the next gaming adventure to embark on.

*Sale refreshes at 00:00am PDT/BST/JST on July 29 and some deals will be replaced by new offers. Sale ends on August 13 at 23:59 PDT/BST/JST. Certain deals end before August 13. Check PlayStation Store for details of individual deals.
